title: Making friends vs Toxic players
body:
I've only recently decided to get an account on the OCE region due to having better ping here and I just see such a substantial more amount of just toxicity in these games compared to North America, not sure if its because I'm not level 30 but trying to level up my account so I can find some nice people to play with. 

I feel as if everyone being toxic creates this barrier from chat for me and gives me this inability to actually make friends in this game. Considering its a team game im pretty much sort of do I really want to play because I enjoy the game, and I just cant pull the chat away as I want to make friends, sure muting them works, then you see them in the end game screen but also the consistent pings is just as bad.

Anyways, long story short im mainly asking if anyone knows any alternatives to getting new friends in league of legends.
